name: Samsung Tab S7 Mystic Black
content: Launch 20.08 Material Metal Unibody Display 11", WQXGA (2560x1600, 274 ppi), LTPS, 120 Hz, Screen to body 83% Processor Snapdragon 865 Plus (Single 3.2 GHz + Triple 2.4 GHz + Quad 1.8 GHz) Network Wifi, LTE Dimension (mm) / (g) 253.8 x 165.3 x 6.3 mm Weight 500g AP Snapdragon 865 Plus (Single 3.2 GHz + Triple 2.4 GHz + Quad 1.8 GHz) Camera Front 8MP Rear 13MP (main) + 5MP (ultra wide) Memory RAM + ROM (GB) 6 GB + 128 GB microSD up to 1 TB Battery (mAh) 8,000mAh (45W Super Fast Charging) Feature S Pen (Magnetic Attachment) - included Quad Speakers with Dolby Atmos & sound by AKG Side fingerprint scanner Inside box Spen, Travel Adapter (15W), Cable USB type C, Ejection Pin, Quick Start Guide
